item.title: Shift in Modern Warfare Turns Defense Firms Into Growth Stocks
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Time was, military contractors appealed to equity investors for their stodginess â€” predictable revenue, solid profit margins and reliable dividends. Times change. While weaponry behemoths like fighter-jet maker Lockheed Martin Corp. and missile producer RTX Corp. still occupy a key co...
